price: Dashĩ, Allah Yanã shiryar da wanda ya bi yardarsa zuwa ga hanyõyin aminci, kuma Yanã fitar da su daga duffai zuwa ga haske da izninsa, kuma Yanã shiryar da su zuwa ga hanya madaidaiciya.
arabic: يَهۡدِي بِهِ ٱللَّهُ مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ رِضۡوَٰنَهُۥ سُبُلَ ٱلسَّلَٰمِ وَيُخۡرِجُهُم مِّنَ ٱلظُّلُمَٰتِ إِلَى ٱلنُّورِ بِإِذۡنِهِۦ وَيَهۡدِيهِمۡ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yahdī bihi al-lahu mani ittabaʿa riḍ'wānahu subula al-salāmi wayukh'rijuhum mina al-ẓulumāti ilā al-nūri bi-idh'nihi wayahdīhim ilā ṣirāṭin mus'taqīmin
